casebody.data:
Hewburn SLOWE, Appellant,
v.
RENT-A-CENTER, et al., Appellees. No. 3D18-724 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed November 28, 2018 Hewburn Slowe, in proper person. Liebler Gonzalez & Portuondo, Elizabeth A. Henriques, and James R. Liebler, II, Miami, for appellees. Before EMAS, LUCK and LINDSEY, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.
